titleStmt.title: Here beginneth the lyf of the moste myscheuoust Robert the deuyll whiche was afterwarde called ye seruaunt of god
Robert the Devil.

publicationStmt.publisher: Enprynted in fletestrete in the sygne of the sonne by Wynkyn de worde,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Robert le diable.
Title from caption title, leaf A2r.
Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.
Signatures: A B⁴ C D⁴ E⁶.
Imperfect; lacks leaf A1, title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: fletestrete in the sygne of the sonne
